meanings.definition: To make a soft, bubbling sound.
meanings.sent1: The pot on the stove was blooping gently as it simmered.
meanings.sent2: I heard the water blooping in the creek as I walked by.
meanings.sent3: The baby found the blooping noise of the fish tank very amusing.
meanings.sent4: The blooping of the coffee machine was a soothing melody in the background.
meanings.sent5: The blooping sound of the soda can opening was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: The act of making a soft, bubbling sound.
meanings.sent1: The constant blooping of the fish tank was calming.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't sleep because of the loud blooping coming from the aquarium.
meanings.sent3: The blooping of the water fountain made the park feel more peaceful.
meanings.sent4: The blooping of the bubbles in the bath was like a mini spa experience.
meanings.sent5: The blooping of the soup boiling on the stove filled the kitchen with a comforting sound.
